projects.title: CodeON - Your programming guide by seniors
description: Implemented a secure authentication system with unique credentials for accessing the portal.
Added Coding Stats using CF API, used cloudinary for image storage, integrated Community Posts and added leaderboard with auto fetching ratings from codeforces.
Utilized Google Gemini LLM models to generate summaries of posts shared by seniors. Implemented a loader and concurrent api requests for improving performance of application by 30%.

projects.title: EcoFind - Your eco-friendly shopping companion
description: Cleansed data and applied feature engineering and keyword filtering on the datasets extracting almost 90% of eco-friendly products from the Kaggle Dataset.
Utilized text vectorization, cosine similarity and serialization of data using pickle module
